title: SMNTY Classics: Jackie Ormes
itunes:title: SMNTY Classics: Jackie Ormes
description:
Yves joins us from her home studio to share the story of Jackie Ormes, the first Black American female cartoonist and creator of beloved (and radical) characters like Torchy Brown and Patty Jo 'n' Ginger in this classic episode.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:keywords: stuff mom never told you, momstuff, mom stuff, anney reese, smnty, feminism, feminist, activism, social justice, samantha mcvey, yves jeffcoat, female firsts, jackie ormes, comics, cartoons, jo 'n ginger, cartoonists, women cartoons, women comics
